attributes.action: avoid reducing the base rate any lower to protect pensioners income from savings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are approximately 6 savers to every mortgage holder. Very many pensioners rely entirely on the interest from quite small savings to make ends meet. Further cuts in the base rate and consequent reductions by banks and building societies in savings rates are hitting hard those who have been prudent and saved for their old age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
